00050 typedef struct _nitf_Record
00051 {
00052     nitf_FileHeader *header;    /*  The file header                    */
00053     nitf_List *images;          /*  A list of ImageSegment*            */
00054     nitf_List *graphics;        /*  A list of GraphicsSegment*         */
00055     nitf_List *labels;          /*  A list of LabelSegment* (2.0 only) */
00056     nitf_List *texts;           /*  A list of TextSegment*             */
00057     nitf_List *dataExtensions;  /*  data extensions segments    */
00058     nitf_List *reservedExtensions;      /*  reserved segments       */
00059     nitf_ParseInfo *parseInfo;  /* An object storing parsing info */
00060 }
00061 nitf_Record;
